code: @Override protected RoutesBuilder createRouteBuilder() throws Exception {     return new RouteBuilder() {          @Override         public void configure() throws Exception {             from(DIRECT_START_1).to(MILO_SERVER_ITEM_1).             from(resolve(MILO_CLIENT_ITEM_C1_1)).to(MOCK_TEST_1).             from(resolve(MILO_CLIENT_ITEM_C2_1)).to(MOCK_TEST_2).             from(resolve(MILO_CLIENT_ITEM_C3_1)).to(MOCK_TEST_3).         }     }. }

code: /**  * Monitor multiple connections, but only one has the correct credentials  */ @Test public void testMonitorItem1() throws Exception {     // item 1 ... only this one receives     this.test1Endpoint.setExpectedCount(1).     this.test1Endpoint.setSleepForEmptyTest(5_000).     // item 2     this.test2Endpoint.setExpectedCount(0).     this.test2Endpoint.setSleepForEmptyTest(5_000).     // item 3     this.test3Endpoint.setExpectedCount(0).     this.test3Endpoint.setSleepForEmptyTest(5_000).     // set server value     this.producer1.sendBody("Foo").     // assert     this.assertMockEndpointsSatisfied(). }
